attributes.action: Abolish ECHR and political correctness nonsense
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i know its a biggy, but it just does not work for the large percentage of civilised, decent people...too many right for criminals. we the tax paying, law abiding citizens are being treated as dummies. criminals thrive on societies understanding and softness and the economy is not progressing as rapidly as it could with echr and an age old rubbish, legal system with judges whos hands are tied by the laws that we created to stop what is actually happening because of those very laws.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
